entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 11.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
